about_the_game:
Welcome to Your Own Supermarket – A Complete and Immersive Management Game!

Dive into a unique management game where you take the reins of a modern supermarket! With Instinc'Team Studio, experience the ultimate in store management in a world with breathtaking detail. Built with Unreal Engine 5.4, the most powerful game engine of the moment, this game offers meticulous, ultra-realistic graphics with exceptional textures and objects. Every detail is designed to fully immerse you in your role as manager.

Management, Strategy, and Customization at Your Fingertips

Step into the shoes of a true manager and control every aspect of your supermarket. Your creativity is the key: design and personalize every area to your liking—storage rooms, walls, floors, exteriors, warehouses, and even the aisles. The customization options don’t stop there: adapt the store to each season and event with a variety of inspiring themes.

Choose the products you want to sell: from fresh fruits and vegetables to decor items, phones, and toys. Decide on your brands and suppliers for each category: favor higher-priced brand-name items to attract specific customers or opt for more affordable products to appeal to a wider audience.

Unique and Innovative Features

Supplier System:

  • Collaborate with multiple suppliers offering the same products, and define your pricing strategy. Some brands may be pricier, but will attract customers willing to pay for quality.

  • Innovative Payment System – Discover T-AirPay, an exclusive in-game payment method, adding a modern touch to your management experience and letting you focus on what matters most.

  • Daily Lottery: Receive random products every day to enrich your supermarket and surprise your customers.

  • Collectible Rewards: Unlock unique trophies and figurines to decorate your office or store space.

Multilingual and Interactive

To reach a global audience, the game is available in multiple languages: French, English, and soon Japanese, Chinese, and many more, with immersive voice acting currently available in French.

Season Pass and Frequent Updates

To enhance the gaming experience, we offer a Season Pass (available in upcoming updates) with exclusive gifts and bonuses. Regular updates will add new content and features, with a public roadmap to keep you informed of upcoming developments in real-time.

Unexpected Visits…

In the dark of your supermarket, keep an eye out. Sometimes, unexpected guests may show up… Is there really a superhero around, or is it just your imagination?

Image Preview:

Prepare to become an accomplished manager and experience an exciting, limitless management adventure!
detailed_description:
BONUS early access

Special Early Access Offer – Support development by purchasing the Early Access version and get exclusive bonuses!

The early access sale of our game is available! By purchasing this early version, you are directly contributing to its development and helping Instinc'Team Studio refine the gaming experience. As thanks for your support, you will receive exclusive in-game bonuses, reserved only for players who have purchased this edition. These unique rewards will only be available on this occasion and will add a special touch to your adventure as a supermarket manager. Join us today to experience this adventure with an exclusive advantage!

name: Superhero Market

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 11
  • Processor: intel i5 / RYZEN 7 3700x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 11
  • Processor: intel i7 14700KF
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 4080 16 Go
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Become the manager of a dynamic supermarket! Manage inventory, optimize store design, plan shelves and improve the customer experience. In this immersive management game, every decision counts to develop your business and satisfy your customers. Are you ready to take on the challenge?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
